abilities.name: Terraforming
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 5 cards from your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order. This power can't be used if Aggron is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mix-Up
attacks.text: Your opponent discards the top card of his or her deck.

abilities.name: Synergy Effect
abilities.text: If Drake's Stadium is in play, remove 1 damage counter from Altaria between turns.

attacks.name: Surprise
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Rock Blast
attacks.text: Discard up to 5 Fighting Energy cards attached to Armaldo. For each Energy card you discarded, choose an opponent's Pokémon in play and this attack does 20 damage to those Pokémon. (You may choose the same Pokémon more than once.) This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Mach Claw
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Grudge
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: Bench Manipulation
attacks.text: Your opponent flips a number of coins equal to the number of his or her Benched Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage times the number of tails. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

abilities.name: Firestarter
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Blaziken is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Fire Stream
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Blaziken. If you do, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.text: Each Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

abilities.name: Evolutionary Call
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play Cradily from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards. Show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Poison Ring
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Energy Draw
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard 1 Energy card from your hand. Then draw up to 3 cards from your deck. This power can't be used if Delcatty is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Max Energy Source
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Psy Shadow
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Energy Burst
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the total amount of Energy attached to Gardevoir and the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Primal Stare
abilities.text: As long as Kabutops is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't play any Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards from his or her hand to evolve his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Luring Antenna
attacks.text: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.

abilities.name: Overzealous
abilities.text: If your opponent has any Pokémon-ex in play, each of Machamp's attacks do 30 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brick Smash
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cross Chop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Raichu.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Raichu.

abilities.name: Lazy
abilities.text: As long as Slaking is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Critical Move
attacks.text: Discard a basic Energy card attached to Slaking or this attack does nothing. Slaking can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Dark Mind
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Mysterious Light
attacks.text: If Phoebe's Stadium is in play, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Energy Grounding
abilities.text: Once during your opponent's turn, when any of your Pokémon is Knocked Out by your opponent's attacks, you may use this power. Choose a basic Energy card discarded from the Knocked Out Pokémon and attach it to Lanturn. You can't use more than 1 Energy Grounding Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Lightning Strike
attacks.text: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to Lanturn. If you do, this attack's base damage is 90 instead of 50.

abilities.name: Magnetic Field
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have basic Energy cards in your discard pile, you may discard any 1 card from your hand. Then search for up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. You can't return the card you first discarded to your hand in this way. This power can't be used if Magneton is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Magnetic Force
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your Pokémon (including Magneton).

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Pull Away
attacks.text: If your opponent has 5 or more cards in his or her hand, your opponent discards a number of cards until your opponent has 4 cards left in his or her hand.

attacks.name: Plunder
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Burst
attacks.text: If Sidney's Stadium is in play, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Ninetales by your opponent's Pokémon-ex.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Pull Down
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokémon in play, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of them and put those cards back into his or her hand.

attacks.name: Hydrocannon
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omastar but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.

attacks.name: Cry for Help
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Lightning Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

abilities.name: Synergy Effect
abilities.text: If Phoebe's Stadium is in play, prevent all damage done to Sableye by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon-ex.

attacks.name: Down Draw
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards from the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokémon between turns.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Wobbuffet by your opponent's Pokémon-ex.

attacks.name: Flip Over
attacks.text: Wobbuffet does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.text: Zangoose can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Sharp Claws
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Solid Shell
abilities.text: Any damage done to Anorith by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Fury Cutter
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If 2 of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage. If all of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage.

abilities.name: Poison Structure
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Sidney's Stadium is in play, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Cacturne is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Scary Face
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.text: When you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Combusken, remove all Special Conditions from Combusken.

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Synergy Effect
abilities.text: If Glacia's Stadium is in play, any damage done to Glalie by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Powder Snow
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Double-edge
attacks.text: Glalie does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Hypnosis
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dream Eater
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Granite Head
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Lairon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Steady Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Vigorous Aura
abilities.text: As long as Medicham is your Active Pokémon, attacks by each player's Active Pokémon do 10 more damage to any Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rolling Kick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.text: Metang can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Extra Comet Punch
attacks.text: During your next turn, Extra Comet Punch does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Tight Jaw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Darkness Charge
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on Sharpedo.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Shelgon.

attacks.name: Dragonbreath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Strikes Back
abilities.text: If Vigoroth is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Vigoroth is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Dig Deep
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Bagon.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Magnetic Lines
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, move a basic Energy card from the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. (Ignore this effect if your opponent has only 1 Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.text: If Carvanha is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Carvanha is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Positive Ion
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Negative Ion
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fast Evolution
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Evolution card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Surprise
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Acid
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Smash Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Submission
attacks.text: Machop does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Cross Chop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Influence
attacks.text: Search your deck for Omanyte, Kabuto, Aerodactyl, Lileep, or Anorith and put up to 2 of them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. Treat the new Benched Pokémon as Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Pikachu.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Teleportation Burst
attacks.text: Switch Ralts with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Seedot.

attacks.name: Double Spin
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Bad Dream
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Pebble Throw
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Double Headbutt
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Defense Curl
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Spheal during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Vulpix.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Wobbuffet from your hand onto Wynaut (this counts as evolving Wynaut) and remove all damage counters from Wynaut.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Wynaut.

name: Battle Frontier
rules: Each player's Colorless Evolved Pokémon, Darkness Evolved Pokémon, and Metal Evolved Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Drake's Stadium
rules: Any damage done to Colorless Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Energy Recycle System
rules: Choose 1:• Put a basic Energy card from your discard pile into your hand.• Shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Removal 2
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and discard it.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Switch
rules: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Glacia's Stadium
rules: Each player's Water Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex) has no Weakness.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Great Ball
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Master Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Phoebe's Stadium
rules: Each player pays ColorlessColorless less to retreat his or her Psychic Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Professor Birch
rules: Draw cards from your deck until you have 6 cards in your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Scott
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 cards in any combination of Supporter cards and Stadium cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Sidney's Stadium
rules: Each player's Darkness Pokémon can't be Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Steven's Advice
rules: Draw a number of cards up to the number of your opponent's Pokémon in play.If you have more than 7 cards (including this one) in your hand, you can't play this card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Claw Fossil

abilities.name: Jagged Stone
abilities.text: If Claw Fossil is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Claw Fossil is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon. Illustrated by Ryo Ueda

rules: If Claw Fossil is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Claw Fossil is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Mysterious Fossil
rules: You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Root Fossil

abilities.name: Spongy Stone
abilities.text: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Root Fossil. Illustrated by Ryo Ueda

rules: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Root Fossil.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Metal Energy
rules: Damage done by attacks to the Pokémon that Metal Energy is attached to is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). Ignore this effect if the Pokémon that Metal Energy is attached to isn't Metal. Metal Energy provides Metal Energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

name: Cyclone Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy. When you play this card from your hand and attach it to your Active Pokémon, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Warp Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy.When you attach this card from your hand to your Active Pokémon, switch that Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Cursed Eyes
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Absol ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may move 3 damage counters from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of his or her Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic Pulse
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Type Shift
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Claydol ex's type is Fighting until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Psychic Boom
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Crush
attacks.text: You may discard a Psychic Energy card attached to Claydol ex. If you do, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Psychic Protector
abilities.text: If Flygon ex is damaged by an opponent's attack, you may discard up to 4 cards from your hand. If you do, any damage done to Flygon ex is reduced by 10 for each card you discarded.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Flygon ex can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

abilities.name: Magnetic Redraw
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Metagross ex is your Active Pokémon, you may use this power. Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws 4 cards. This power can't be used if Metagross ex is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Scanblast
attacks.text: Does 70 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has the same name as the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Volcanic Flame
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards from your deck.

attacks.name: Hydro Wave
attacks.text: Discard all Water Energy attached to Salamence ex. This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Skill Hack
attacks.text: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card you find there. Choose 1 of that Pokémon's attacks. Skill Hack copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) (No matter what type that Pokémon is, Shiftry ex's type is still Darkness.) Shiftry ex performs that attack.

attacks.name: Dirge
attacks.text: Does 60 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has the same name as the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Metal Gravity
abilities.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon retreats and has 40 or more remaining HP, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Metal Gravity Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Chilling Breath
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play Walrein ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this power. Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Wreck
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 70 damage plus 20 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

abilities.name: Crimson Ray
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Flareon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Flareon Star.

abilities.name: Yellow Ray
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Jolteon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Jolteon Star during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Blue Ray
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Vaporeon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
